text: Little Superman is a 2014 Malayalam 3-D superhero film directed by Vinayan, starring Master Deny, Baby Nayanthara, Ansiba Hassan and Praveena in the lead roles. The film was inspired by the superhero character Superman. The film was dubbed and released in Tamil and Hindi.https://www.moviebuff.com/little- supermanhttps://www.ibtimes.co.in/little-superman-3d-review-critics-call- vinayans-movie-visual- experience-613393https://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/little- superman.htmlhttp://www.sify.com/movies/little-superman-3d-review-malayalam- pcmb0Jdjadjea.html ==Plot== Willy Wilson, a 12 year old comic book aficionado, falls into a manhole and gets trapped inside it for days and soon figures out that he has the ability to fly and lift things up with the help of telekinesis.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2961118/plotsummary?ref_=tt_ql_stry_2 ==Cast== * Master Deny * Baby Nayanthara * Ansiba Hassan * Praveena * Madhu ==Music== The music of Little Superman is by Mohan Sithara and the Background Music by Jovey George Sujo. The lyrics are written by Kaithapram Damodaran. ==Release== Little Superman was released on 7 November 2014 (India).https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2961118/releaseinfo?ref_=ttpl_ql_dt_2 ==See also== * Superhero film ==References== ==External links== * Category:2014 films Category:2010s Malayalam-language films Category:2010s Indian superhero films Category:2010s children's fantasy films Category:Indian films Category:Indian children's films Category:Films directed by Vinayan
title: Little Superman
